2COR 4.10 sinteino dauþein fraujins Iesuis ana leika unsaramma...
2COR 4.11 sinteino weis libandans in dauþu atgibanda in Iesuis, ei jah libains Iesuis swikunþa wairþai in riurjamma leika unsaramma.
2COR 4.12 swaei nu dauþus in uns waurkeiþ, iþ libains in izwis.

2COR 4.13 habandans nu þana saman ahman galaubeinais bi þamma gamelidin: galaubida, in þizei jah rodida, jah weis galaubjam, in þizei jah rodjam, 2COR 4.14 witandans þatei sa urraisjands fraujan Iesu jah unsis þairh Iesu urraiseiþ jah fauragasatjiþ miþ izwis.
2COR 4.15 þatuh þan allata in izwara, ei ansts managnandei þairh managizans awiliud ufarassjai du wulþau guda.
2COR 4.16 inuh þis ni wairþam usgrudjans, akei þauhjabai sa utana unsar manna frawardjada, aiþþau sa innuma ananiujada daga jah daga.
2COR 4.17 unte þata andwairþo ƕeilaƕairb jah leiht aglons unsaraizos bi ufarassau aiweinis wulþaus kaurein waurkjada unsis, 2COR 4.18 ni fairweitjandam þize gasaiƕanane, ak þizei ungasaiƕanane;
unte þo gasaiƕanona riurja sind, iþ þo ungasaiƕanona aiweina.
...2COR 5.1 us guda habam, gard unhanduwaurhtana aiweinana in himinam.
2COR 5.2 unte jah in þamma swogatjam, bauainai unsarai þizai us himina ufarhamon gairnjandans, 2COR 5.3 jabai sweþauh gawasidai, ni naqadai bigitaindau.
2COR 5.4 jah auk wisandans in þizai hleiþrai swogatjam kauridai, ana þammei ni wileima afhamon, ak anahamon, ei fraslindaidau þata diwano fram libainai.
2COR 5.5 aþþan saei jaggamanwida uns du þamma guþ, saei jah gaf unsis wadi ahman.
2COR 5.6 gatrauandans nu sinteino jah witandans þatei wisandans in þamma leika afhaimjai sijum fram fraujin;
2COR 5.7 unte þairh galaubein gaggam, ni þairh siun.
2COR 5.8 aþþan gatrauam jah waljam mais usleiþan us þamma leika jah anahaimjaim wisan at fraujin.
2COR 5.9 in-uþ-þis usdaudjam, jaþþe anahaimjai jaþþe afhaimjai, waila galeikan imma.
2COR 5.10 unte allai weis ataugjan skuldai sijum faura stauastola Xristaus, ei ganimai ƕarjizuh þo swesona leikis, afar þaimei gatawida, jaþþe þiuþ jaþþe unþiuþ.
2COR 5.11 witandans nu agis fraujins mannans fullaweisjam, iþ guda swikunþai sijum.

aþþan wenja jah in miþwisseim izwaraim swikunþans wisan uns, 2COR 5.12 ni ei aftra uns silbans uskannjaima izwis, ak lew gibandans izwis ƕoftuljos fram unsis, ei habaiþ wiþra þans in andwairþja ƕopandans janni in hairtin.
2COR 5.14 unte friaþwa Xristaus dishabaiþ uns, 2COR 5.15 domjandans þata þatei ains faur allans gaswalt,
jah faur allans gaswalt, ei þai libandans ni þanaseiþs sis silbam libaina, ak þamma faur sik gaswiltandin jah urreisandin.
2COR 5.16 swaei weis fram þamma nu ni ainnohun kunnum bi leika;
iþ jabai ufkunþedum bi leika Xristu, akei nu ni þanaseiþs ni kunnum.
2COR 5.17 swaei jabai ƕo in Xristau niuja gaskafts, þo alþjona usliþun;
2COR 5.18 aþþan alla us guda, þamma gafriþondin uns sis þairh Xristu jaggibandin unsis andbahti gafriþonais.
2COR 5.19 unte sweþauh guþ was in Xristau manaseþ gafriþonds sis, ni rahnjands im missadedins ize jah lagjands in uns waurd gafriþonais.
2COR 5.20 faur Xristu nu airinom, swe at guda gaþlaihandin þairh uns;
2COR 5.21 unte þana ize ni kunþa frawaurht, faur uns gatawida frawaurht, ei weis waurþeima garaihtei gudis in imma.
2COR 6.1 Gawaurstwans jaþþan bidjandans, ni sware anst gudis niman izwis.
2COR 6.2 mela auk, qiþiþ, andanemjamma andhausida þus jah in daga naseinais gahalp þeina.
